verses.verse: And the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3615>pass<s%>, when they had eaten up the <S%H7668>grain<s%> which they had brought <S%H935>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7725>them<s%>, Go again, <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, The <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>protest<s%> unto <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H1115>except<s%> your brother be with <S%H251>you<s%>.
If thou <S%H3426>wilt<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> with <S%H3381>us<s%>, we will go down and <S%H7666>buy<s%> thee <S%H400>food<s%>:

but if thou wilt not <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3381>him<s%>, we will not go down; for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>us<s%>, Ye shall not see my <S%H6440>face<s%>, except your brother be with <S%H251>you<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore dealt ye so <S%H7489>ill<s%> with <S%H5046>me<s%>, as to tell the <S%H376>man<s%> whether ye had yet a <S%H251>brother<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H7592>straitly<s%> concerning <S%H4138>ourselves<s%>, and concerning our kindred, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3426>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>? have <S%H3426>ye<s%> another <S%H251>brother<s%>? and we <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%>: could we in any wise <S%H3045>know<s%> that he would <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3381>Bring<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%>?

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H7971>Send<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> with <S%H6965>me<s%>, and we will arise and <S%H3212>go<s%>; that we may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>, both <S%H2945>we<s%>, and thou, and also our little ones.

I will be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for <S%H3027>him<s%>; of my hand shalt thou <S%H1245>require<s%> <S%H518>him<s%>: if I <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H518>not<s%> unto <S%H3322>thee<s%>, and set him before <S%H6440>thee<s%>, then let me bear the <S%H2398>blame<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>:
for <S%H3884>except<s%> we had <S%H4102>lingered<s%>, surely we had now <S%H7725>returned<s%> a second <S%H6471>time<s%>.

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H645>them<s%>, If it be so now, <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3947>this<s%>: take of the choice <S%H2173>fruits<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and carry <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%>, and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>, <S%H5219>spicery<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh<s%>, <S%H992>nuts<s%>, and <S%H8247>almonds<s%>;

and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks<s%> carry <S%H7725>again<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; peradventure it was an <S%H4870>oversight<s%>:
take <S%H3947><s%> also your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, go <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>:

and <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>, that he may <S%H7971>release<s%> unto you your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>. And <S%H834>if<s%> I be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my <S%H7921>children<s%>, I am bereaved.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2063>that<s%> <S%H4503>present<s%>, and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, he said to the steward of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H2873>slay<s%>, and make <S%H3559>ready<s%>; for the <S%H582>men<s%> shall <S%H398>dine<s%> with me at <S%H6672>noon<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, because they were <S%H935>brought<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1697>Because<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> are we brought <S%H935>in<s%>; that he may seek <S%H1556>occasion<s%> against <S%H5307>us<s%>, and fall upon <S%H3947>us<s%>, and take us for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, and our <S%H2543>asses<s%>.
And they came <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H376>steward<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>,
and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, we came <S%H3381>indeed<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>:

and it came to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when we came to the <S%H4411>lodging-place<s%>, that we <S%H6605>opened<s%> our <S%H572>sacks<s%>, <S%H376>and<s%>, behold, every man's <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack<s%>, our <S%H3701>money<s%> in full <S%H4948>weight<s%>: and we have brought it <S%H7725>again<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> have we brought <S%H3381>down<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>: we know not <S%H3045>who<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be to <S%H3372>you<s%>, fear <S%H430>not<s%>: your God, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4301>treasure<s%> in your <S%H572>sacks<s%>: I <S%H935>had<s%> your <S%H3701>money<s%>. And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> Simeon out unto <S%H8095>them<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%>, and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%>.

And they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H935>coming<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>: for they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they should <S%H398>eat<s%> bread <S%H3899>there<s%>.

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>, they <S%H935>brought<s%> him the <S%H4503>present<s%> which was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> down themselves to him to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> them of their <S%H7965>welfare<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7965>well<s%>, the old <S%H2205>man<s%> of whom ye <S%H559>spake<s%>? Is he yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>?
And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H7965>well<s%>, he is yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>. And they bowed the <S%H6915>head<s%>, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>.

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is this your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>, of whom ye <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>? And he said, <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H1121>thee<s%>, my son.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H4116>haste<s%>; for his <S%H7356>heart<s%> <S%H3648>yearned<s%> over his <S%H251>brother<s%>: and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> where to <S%H1058>weep<s%>; and he <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H2315>chamber<s%>, and wept <S%H1058>there<s%>.
And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and came <S%H3318>out<s%>; and he <S%H662>refrained<s%> <S%H559>himself<s%>, and said, Set <S%H7760>on<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And they set <S%H7760>on<s%> for him by <S%H4713>himself<s%>, and for them by themselves, and for the Egyptians, that did <S%H398>eat<s%> with <S%H4713>him<s%>, by themselves: because the Egyptians <S%H3201>might<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>; for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>, the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> according to his <S%H1062>birthright<s%>, and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H8539>marvelled<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H7453>another<s%>.

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> and sent <S%H4864>messes<s%> unto them from before <S%H6440>him<s%>: but <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H4864>mess<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3027>times<s%> so much <S%H7235>as<s%> any of <S%H8354>theirs<s%>. And they drank, and were merry with <S%H7937>him<s%>.
